Posts.Content: Good luck Yvonne with your operation. X
Posts.Title: Weird & Wobbly

Posts.Content: Hi mrsjojo, good luck with 1st treatment tomorrow.  I know it really sucks when you have wee ones at home. I have a 3 yr old,5 yr old and a 16 yr old and the last thing you want is for them to see you unwell. But you know what the cuddles that you get back from them help make up for it.  Be strong. Xx
Posts.Title: Coping with chemo
